title: 'Moneyball' Meets Crypto in 'The Boys of Summer' Experimental NFT Game

title: MoonPay CEO was responsible for $500K donation to Miami mayorâ€™s super PAC
description:
Miami mayor Francis Suarez’s presidential campaign received a donation from the CEO of the crypto firm MoonPay, the Miami Herald reported on Aug. 1. That report states that a political action committee (PAC) supporting Suarez received a $500,000 donation from PassionForest, LLC, on Oct. 28, 2022. The donation attracted further attention on July 25, 2023, […]
